```{r load, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)
```

```{r read_csv}
acs_load_and_tidy = function(path, var_name) {
  
  df = read_csv(path) %>%
    janitor::clean_names() %>%
    filter(str_detect(geoname, "County")) %>%
    rename("county" = "geoname",
           var_name = "estimate") %>%
    select(county, var_name)
  
  df
}

acs_list = 
  list(
    acs_load_and_tidy("./ACS_data/ACS_2019_Median_Household_Income.csv", "hhold_inc"),
    acs_load_and_tidy("./ACS_data/ACS_2019_Percent_AmInd.csv", "am_ind"),
    acs_load_and_tidy("./ACS_data/ACS_2019_Percent_Asian.csv", "asian"),
    acs_load_and_tidy("./ACS_data/ACS_2019_Percent_Black.csv", "black"),
    acs_load_and_tidy("./ACS_data/ACS_2019_Percent_White_NonHispanic.csv", "white"),
    acs_load_and_tidy("./ACS_data/ACS_2019_Percent_Multiple_Races.csv", "multiple_race"),
    acs_load_and_tidy("./ACS_data/ACS_2019_Percent_Foreign_Born.csv", "foreign_born"),
    acs_load_and_tidy("./ACS_data/ACS_2019_Percent_Children_without_Insurance.csv", "kids_no_ins"),
    acs_load_and_tidy("./ACS_data/ACS_2019_Percent_Households_with_SNAP.csv", "SNAP"),
    acs_load_and_tidy("./ACS_data/ACS_2019_Percent_People_25+_With_HS_Degree.csv", "hs_degree"),
    acs_load_and_tidy("./ACS_data/ACS_2019_Percent_People_25+_With_Bachelors.csv", "bachelors"),
    acs_load_and_tidy("./ACS_data/ACS_2019_Percent_People_25+_With_Advanced_Degree.csv", "adv_degree"))

acs_tidy = plyr::join_all(acs_list, by = 'county', type = 'left')
```
